DOC.brief_summary: A study test pharmacokinetics twice daily administration MK-0941 placebo subject type 2 diabetes inadequate control metformin .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study MK-0941 After Multiple Daily Doses Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes ( MK-0941-012 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Subject BMI < 42 kg/m2 Subject take > 1500 mg metformin per day least 8 week Subject HbA1c value 7.0 % < 11 % screen Subject willing follow AHA weight maintain diet exercise program Subject nonsmoker least 6 month Subject type 1 diabetes Subject history stroke chronic seizure Subject history neoplastic disease Subject history gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , blood , liver kidney , respiratory , immunological genitourinary disorder disease Subject currently take 2 diabetes medication Subject glaucoma blind If female , subject pregnant breastfeeding Subject consume > 3 alcoholic beverage per day Subject major surgery donate blood last 4 week
